conclusion: Understand the propagation of waves and calculate the time for intersection.
Wave source at x = -0.2 m propagates to the right and wave source at x = 1.2 m propagates to the left.
Distance between the two sources is 1.4 m.
Both waves travel at a speed of 0.4 m/s.
Relative speed of the waves is 0.8 m/s.
Time for the waves to meet is 1.75 seconds.
Intermediate reasoning: Distance is 1.4 meters and relative speed is 0.8 meters per second.
Final answer: The two waves will meet after 1.75 seconds.
